cause.description:
First of all, the best kind of music out there is rock. that has to be stated first. Classic rock fans are first loyal to their music. It is hard to belive but there are people who dont know about how awesome it is to "rock out." Rockers need to band together to make sure people know how to rock out. Either by blaring metal in your car with the windows down, or by making your neighbors move because your stereo is too loud, This group is too preserve classic rock by showing others how awesome classic rock is. And to just appreciate Zeppelin, ACDC, Metallica, Pantera, Rage, and any other band that has the capacity to rock someone's brain out.
1. rock music kicks ass
2. people need to have the opportunity to listen to rock
3. MTV & VH1 and BET sucks
4. fuck the mainstream
5. FUCK THE MAN!!!
cause.mission: preserve the face melting riffs of hard rock and metal and to show others that classic rock kicks the piss out of hip hop
cause.name: SAVE Rock
